hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

HC (Malon).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Gerudo Card#.
